Package com.platform.payment.internal

package com.platform.payment.internal
  • Class
    Description
    Invoice
    Invoice entity for billing documents with Stripe integration.
    Invoice.Status
    Invoice status enumeration based on Stripe invoice states
    Payment
    Payment entity for tracking payment transactions with Stripe integration.
    Payment.Status
    Payment status enumeration based on Stripe PaymentIntent states

    Read-only projection of a PaymentMethod for API layer mapping.

    PaymentView
